body: I guess what I am asking with the surface is this:  Input into the TOF component has a surface that has area of 372 [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/I3qJw2-zaOG3sRKlwBVYAGe9UXwZFrLkouhvxm2zj5zhzlvdFUC9ET4rLJWrxUvw-BKTraVB8jOor50c0PELiKNrDvyu3w1P/Capture.PNG) Then what comes out of the SystemSize component is a surface that has area of 29 [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/I3qJw2-zaOErZwXdLbBNbE*Q05XVyG2EjuO97EUjwqsIZd0zT3TeevRRjCutGc36QE85Dyg4kOgdrxjD4QAGs82DHIWjMP-s/Capture1.PNG) These small surfaces are what goes into the _PVSurface input and I think they are being analyzed here...right? If that's the case then we are not getting the right kWh output... Unless I am getting something wrong here. Sorry for all these questions.
